featSummaries.name: Great Cleave
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +4.

featSummaries.name: Oread Earth Glider
featSummaries.prerequisites: Oread Burrower, Stony Step, character level 13th, oread.

featSummaries.name: Pinpoint Targeting
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 19, Improved Precise Shot, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +16.

featSummaries.name: Wave Strike
featSummaries.prerequisites: Weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw, Bluff 1 rank.

featSummaries.name: Siege Commander
featSummaries.prerequisites: Craft (siege weapon) 5 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 1 rank.

featSummaries.name: Snatch Arrows
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 15, Deflect Arrows, Improved Unarmed Strike.

featSummaries.name: Thrill of the Kill
featSummaries.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

featSummaries.name: Domain Strike
featSummaries.prerequisites: Domain class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

featSummaries.name: Exploit Lore
featSummaries.prerequisites: Monster lore class feature, base attack bonus +11.

featSummaries.name: Panther Style
featSummaries.prerequisites: Wis 13, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike.

featSummaries.name: Greater Sunder
featSummaries.prerequisites: Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6, Str 13.

featSummaries.name: Greater Dirty Trick
featSummaries.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, base attack bonus +6.

featSummaries.name: Intimidating Confidence
featSummaries.prerequisites: Cha 13, Fearless Curiosity, Intimidate 5 ranks, human.

featSummaries.name: Versatile Channeler
featSummaries.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, necromancer or neutrally aligned cleric (see below).

featSummaries.name: Two-Weapon Feint
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 15, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Two-Weapon Fighting.

featSummaries.name: Unseat
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Ride 1 rank, Mounted Combat, Power Attack, Improved Bull Rush, base attack bonus +1.

featSummaries.name: Marid Coldsnap
featSummaries.prerequisites: Con 15, Wis 17, Elemental Fist**, Marid Spirit, Marid Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 11th.
featSummaries.prerequisitesFormula: (@con_score >= 15 OR @wis_score >= 17 OR @feat:elemental_fist OR @feat:marid_spirit OR @feat:marid_style OR @feat:improved_unarmed_strike OR @bab >= 13 OR @class:monk >= 11)

featSummaries.name: Dispelling Critical
featSummaries.prerequisites: Arcane Strike, base attack bonus +11, ability to cast dispel magic.

featSummaries.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +1, proficient with weapon, weapon made of primitive material.

featSummaries.name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 19, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

featSummaries.name: Prone Shooter
featSummaries.prerequisites: Weapon Focus (crossbow or firearm), base attack bonus +1.

featSummaries.name: Twin Thunders
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Two-Weapon Fighting or flurry of blows class feature, Weapon Focus with both wielded weapons.

featSummaries.name: Powerful Shape
featSummaries.prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, druid level 8th.

featSummaries.name: Spirited Charge
featSummaries.prerequisites: Ride 1 rank, Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack.

featSummaries.name: Greater Snap Shot
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 17, Improved Snap Shot, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, base attack bonus +12.

featSummaries.name: Crossbow Mastery
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Reload, Rapid Shot.

featSummaries.name: Swift Aid
featSummaries.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

featSummaries.name: Chokehold
featSummaries.prerequisites: Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.

featSummaries.name: Dazing Assault
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +11.

featSummaries.name: Expert Driver
featSummaries.prerequisites: Skilled Driver with the selected vehicle type.

featSummaries.name: Mystic Stride
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 15, Nimble Moves, woodland stride class feature.

featSummaries.name: Leaping Shot Deed
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 13, grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat, Dodge, Mobility, base attack bonus +4.

featSummaries.name: Charge Through
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Overrun, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

featSummaries.name: Greater Channel Smite
featSummaries.prerequisites: Channel energy class feature, Channel Smite, base attack bonus +8.

featSummaries.name: Spellsong
featSummaries.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class ability, able to cast 1st-level spells.

featSummaries.name: Fire Music
featSummaries.prerequisites: Spellcraft 5 ranks, ability to cast bard spells, ability to cast an arcane fire spell from some other spellcasting class.
featSummaries.prerequisitesFormula: @skill:spellcraft >= 5 AND @bility:bard_spellcaster AND "an arcane fire spell from some other spellcasting"

featSummaries.name: Enfilading Fire
featSummaries.prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, one other teamwork feat.

featSummaries.name: Greater Shield Specialization
featSummaries.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected shield, Greater Shield Focus, Shield Focus, Shield Specialization with selected shield, fighter level 12th.

featSummaries.name: Pinning Knockout
featSummaries.prerequisites: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

featSummaries.name: Shield Specialization
featSummaries.prerequisites: Proficiency with selected shield, Shield Focus, fighter level 4th.

featSummaries.name: Deathless Zealot
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Con 17, orc or half-orc, Deathless Initiate, Deathless Master, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide**, base attack bonus +12.
featSummaries.prerequisitesFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 17 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:deathless_initiate AND @feat:deathless_master AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @feat:ironhide AND @bab >= 12

featSummaries.name: Multitalented Mastery
featSummaries.prerequisites: Character level 5th, half-elf, multitalented racial trait.

featSummaries.name: Improved Critical
featSummaries.prerequisites: Proficient with weapon, base attack bonus +8.

featSummaries.name: Surprise Follow-Through
featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

featSummaries.name: Extra Mercy
featSummaries.prerequisites: Lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

featSummaries.name: Create Reliquary Arms and Shields
featSummaries.prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, ability to cast consecrate or desecrate.

featSummaries.name: Knockout Artist
featSummaries.prerequisites: Sneak attack class feature, Improved Unarmed Strike.

featSummaries.name: Spontaneous Metafocus
featSummaries.prerequisites: Cha 13, one metamagic feat, able to spontaneously cast spells.

featSummaries.name: Gore Fiend
featSummaries.prerequisites: Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

featSummaries.name: Mantis Style
featSummaries.prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Stunning Fist, Heal 3 ranks.

featSummaries.name: Second Chance
featSummaries.prerequisites: Int 13, Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

featSummaries.name: Rending Fury
featSummaries.prerequisites: Base attack bonus +6, rend special attack.

featSummaries.name: Stone Singer
featSummaries.prerequisites: Cha 13, bardic performance class feature, dwarf.

featSummaries.name: Elusive Redirection
featSummaries.prerequisites: Elusive target class feature, Combat Expertise, Improved Unarmed Strike, flowing monk level 12th.

featSummaries.name: Critical Mastery
featSummaries.prerequisites: Critical Focus, any two critical feats, 14th-level fighter.

featSummaries.name: Destructive Dispel
featSummaries.prerequisites: Ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic, caster level 11th.

featSummaries.name: Moonlight Summons
featSummaries.prerequisites: Spell Focus (conjuration), able to cast summon nature's ally.
featSummaries.prerequisitesFormula: @feat:spell_focus#conjuration AND (@spell:summon_natures_ally_1 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_2 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_3 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_4 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_5 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_6 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_7 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_8 OR @spell:summon_natures_ally_9)

featSummaries.name: Sneaking Precision
featSummaries.prerequisites: Sneak attack class feature, Critical Focus, any critical feat, base attack bonus +9.

featSummaries.name: Half-Drow Paragon
featSummaries.prerequisites: Drow-blooded and drow magic racial traits, half-elf.

featSummaries.name: Insightful Gaze

featSummaries.prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
